contribution_desc:
Investigates the use of pinching, swiping, swinging and flicking for moving objects between a handheld device and a large display, looking at their effectiveness, efficiency and accuracy.

Techniques are reimplementations of techniques found in prior work. Mostly derivative of pick&drop in various forms. Using Kinect to track body and touch/IMU on the mobile device.

Contribution is mostly the study.
tracking_characteristic: Tracking users only; Tracking device through user's body; Inside-out tracking; Outside-in tracking
